narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Developmental Delay Rehabilitation Services Inc. is a Early Intervention Provider Agency provider based in Nanuet, NY. From 2019-04 through 2020-03, this provider received $158K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 326 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 98% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 92507 (92507). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2020-03, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
